meanings.definition: A tall palm tree with large leaves and edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The palmyras swayed gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe palmyras from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys had a party in the palmyras, tossing fruit around.
meanings.sent4: The palmyras stood like guardians of the forest, their fruit a treasure.
meanings.sent5: Under the shade of the palmyras, we enjoyed a picnic.

meanings.sent1: The ancient palmyras bustled with market activity.
meanings.sent2: I visited Palmyras during my trip to Syria.
meanings.sent3: The palmyras residents organized a quirky festival every year.
meanings.sent4: Palmyras was a beacon of history in the region.
meanings.sent5: The lights of Palmyras twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A type of sugar made from the sap of the palmyra palm.
meanings.sent1: The dessert was sweetened with palmyras sugar.
meanings.sent2: I bought some palmyras sugar to use in baking.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled palmyras sugar all over the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of palmyras sugar filled the room, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The palmyras sugar added a unique flavor to the dish.
